item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello, This is an introductory post. Here is a plot: mpg %>% ggplot()+ geom_point(aes(x = hwy, y = cty))+ theme_minimal()

item.title: About Me
item.description: HI, My name is José… It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Setup Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan. Coded in Vim using spf13-vim Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub or ask me on Twitter.
